title: IHCL opens 86-key Ginger hotel in Nagpur
description: IHCL opened an 86-key Ginger hotel in Nagpur near Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar Airport, offering seamless connectivity to the new metro line. The opening aligns with IHCL's vision of establishing a presence in key commercial centres.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
